#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define pb push_back
#define ft first
#define se second
#define mp make_pair

int dp[1001][1001];
int main(int argc, char const *argv[]) {
    int t, g;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    g = t;
    while (t--) {
    	int m, n;
    	string a, b;
    	scanf("%d%d", &m, &n);
    	cin >> a >> b;
    	for (int i = 0; i <= m; ++i) dp[i][0] = i;
    	for (int i = 0; i <= n; ++i) dp[0][i] = i;
    	for (int i = 1; i <= m; ++i) {
    		for(int j = 1; j <= n; ++j) { 
    			dp[i][j] = 2001; 
    			if (a[i - 1] == b[j - 1]) dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j - 1] + 1;
    			dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j] + 1);
    			dp[i][j] = min(dp[i][j], dp[i][j - 1] + 1);
    		}
    	}
    	printf("Case %d: %d\n", g - t, dp[m][n]);
    }
	return 0;
}
